trait.name: Adaptive Plating
entries: When the roach has less than half its hit points its AC becomes 16 for 1 minute. After the roach has benefited from adaptive plating, it can't do so again after it has finished a long rest.

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: The roach regains 5 hit points at the start of its turn if it has at least 1 hit point and has not been damaged since the end of its last turn.

action.name: Acidic Saliva
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} to hit, range 30/90 ft., one target. Hit 23 ({@damage 4d10 + 3}) acid damage.
